    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Initializes the environment for the game including starter values, timelines, and Alien generation.

      • startTimeLine

        public void startTimeLine()
        Generates the gameplay Timeline object that is the central timer for the game. Include are various TimerTasks that run scheduled tasks in the background to support the various functionalities of the game.

      • animate

        public void animate()
        Triggers animations for Aliens, Towers, and Bullets

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver(Enemy alien)
        Method that checks if the game is over, if so, pauses the timer and initiated the game over updating presenting user with a Modal.

      • getSpeedMultiplier

        public int getSpeedMultiplier()
        Public Accessor method for the speedMultiplier attribute
        Returns:

      • generateAliens

        public void generateAliens()
        Generates the alien waves with differing numbers of aliens and differing types at each level.

      • delaySpawn

        public void delaySpawn(long delay)
        Utility method used to delay the spawning. Place the Thread to sleep for a specified period of time, given by delay.
        Parameters:
        delay - Time specified to place the Thread to its sleep state

      • waveOneSpawn

        public void waveOneSpawn()
        Handles the spawning for the first set in the first wave of enemies

        Handles the spawning for the first set in the third wave of enemies

        public void generateTank(int amount)
        Generates a Tank object of a specified Amount
        Parameters:

      • increaseSpeed

        public void increaseSpeed()
        Utility method used to increase the animation/play speed of the game. Currently supports 1x and 2x speed.

      • updateAlienAnimation

        public void updateAlienAnimation(int speed)
                          throws java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
        Utility method to update an Enemy animation according to a give speed.
        Parameters:
        speed - Updated speed that the animation should run at
        Throws:
        java.util.ConcurrentModificationException

      • pause

        public void pause()
           throws java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
        Pauses the gameplay timer and updates all animations to pause them.
        Throws:
        java.util.ConcurrentModificationException

      • resume

        public void resume()
        Resumes the gameplay timer and updates all animations to resume them at the current speedMultiplier.

      • placeCharacter

        public void placeCharacter(BoardCharacter character,
                           int row,
                           int col)
        Places a BoardCharacter object at a specificed row and col on the board. Ensures that each character type is handled accordingly.
        Parameters:
        character - BoardCharacter to be placed
        row - given row position for placement
        col - given col position for placement

      • depositSpacebucks

        public void depositSpacebucks(int amount)
        Deposits specified amount of spacebucks into the players bank
        Parameters:
        amount -

      • removeTower

        public void removeTower(DefenderTower towerToRemove,
                        int row,
                        int col)
        Removes a given tower specified at a given row/col.
        Parameters:
        towerToRemove - DefenderTower to remove
        row - given row position to remove
        col - given col position to remove

      • assignMap

        public void assignMap(int mapId)
        Generates a HashMap of restricted row, [col, col, ...] pairs. This will be used to ensure that the location if prohibited from placement and populated with the corresponding image in the View.
        Parameters:
        mapId - ID for the given map to distinguish the level of difficulty

      • assignGameMode

        public void assignGameMode(int modeId)
        Assigns the requested game mode, depending on the provided ID. Can either be standard or double cost game modes
        Parameters:
        modeId - Int ID associated with requested game mode

      • getRestrictedTiles

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer>> getRestrictedTiles()
        Public Accesssor method for restrictedTiles HashMap
        Returns:
        HashMap populated using assignMap()

      • playBulletNoise

        public void playBulletNoise(Ammo bullet)
        Given a specified Bullet object, it will play the corresponding sound snippet for that particular class.
        Parameters:
        bullet - Specified bullet to play sound effect for
